title: Baked macaroni Bolognese
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '500g lean beef mince', '1 large onion, finely chopped', '2 carrot, finely chopped', '2 celery sticks, finely chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 (400g) tin can chopped tomatoes', '450g tomato passata', '1/2 teaspoon dried oregano, or to taste', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '400g macaroni', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', '100g ricotta cheese', '50g mozzarella, diced']
